overview: In our sedentary world, it’s important to keep as physically active as possible – so full credit to our boys for wanting to get out there and keep fit! All the same, there’s no denying that their idea of a physical workout is perhaps somewhat different to your usual recommended cardiovascular exercise; with the likes of Kris Blent, Ray Mannix and Jaro Stone quickly abandoning their jog around the block in favor of a hardcore drill of cock-sucking and ass-fucking. It might not be conventional, but with spunk-drenched faces and jizz-coated puckers all round, we’ve a sneaking suspicion there’s gonna be very few complaints!
title: Keep On Running
